item.title: Formatting Python Code
item.description: Styling Guide (PEP8) You can read it here. To start following it, install locally pycodestyle package and run it through your code. $ pip install pycodestyle $ pycodestyle --ignore=E501 run.py run.py:15:1: E302 expected 2 blank lines, found 1
